effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 411,885 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 203,246.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Reversion's healing is increased by 10%, and it has a 50% chance to grant 1 additional stack of Temporal Compression.
(4) Set: Temporal Compression increases the healing of your next empower spell by 5% per stack.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Reignite the pilot light to gain 9,300 Intellect for 15 sec. After casting 3 harmful spells, it unleashes a beam dealing 1.8 million Fire damage to your primary target and 150,311 damage to up to 5 enemies in its path. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 373 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 61,704 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 140,244.
